Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The 4612del165 mutations in three different families were all ascribed to the same T - - > A substitution at the splice donor site in intron 33 .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| 4612del165 |
| T - - > A substitution at the splice donor site in intron 33 |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid entities that clearly refer to "Disease" in the given paragraph:

| Disease |
| --- |
| 4612del165 |

The other entity mentioned in the paragraph, "T - - > A substitution at the splice donor site in intron 33", is not a disease, but rather a genetic mutation that may be associated with a disease. Therefore, it is not included in the list of valid disease entities.
